name: Hoshizora no Memoria -Wish upon a Shooting Star-
description: A Japanese love adventure game, as you follow the story of Kogasaka You, his hometown and a promise he made.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Pentium4 1.3GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 6 GB available space
